summary: A lyrical telling of the coming of age of a 13-year-old boy who learns to cope with his newfound sexuality and his unrequited love for the cool kid in school.
cast: Malcolm Stumpf|Patrick White|Max Paradise|Fairuza Balk|Kim Dickens|Tom Gilroy|Ruth Elliott|Joey Coffman|Tim Greer|Dash Mann|Derek Mitchler|Kylee Mains|Teresa Morales|James Porter|Bernadette Wilson|Bill Dana|Sarah Gregory|Lisa Hadley|Nina Simone
keywords: boy dressed as a girl|crossdressing|gay boy|hooded sweatshirt|roller skate
title: Wild Tigers I Have Known
